messages.title: REAL CHANGE
messages.content: Labour offers the real change Basingstoke needs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investment in Jobs and Public Services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour plans to rebuild public services by taxing the richest in society and investing in jobs and public services.
Terry pledges a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create high-skilled jobs in Basingstoke.
An emphasis on reducing class sizes, restoring student grants and free school meals for primary schools.
Labour will tackle the housing crisis and ensure everyone has a decent home.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet contains a tactical voting message stating that 'Only Labour can beat the Tories here'.

issues.education: Reducing class sizes, restoring student grants, and free school meals for primary schools.

housing.content: Labour will tackle the housing crisis and ensure everyone has a decent home.

leaflet.personalStatement: Terry Bridgeman states that he's passionate about Basingstoke and promises to put residents first.

images.caption: Terry Bridgeman pictured on the leaflet.
